entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who is being shouted at by Hermione. He has an annoying sing-song voice and refuses to tell Filch where Harry and his friends went unless he says please.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione snarled at Peeves and grabbed Harry's wand to unlock the door. She whispered 'Alohomora!' to open the lock.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry had his wand taken by Hermione and was trying to get off Neville's sleeve. He thought they would be okay because Filch thinks this door is locked.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch was saying 'Quick, tell me' where Harry and his friends went. He cursed in rage when Peeves whooshed away.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville had been tugging on the sleeve of Harry's dressing-gown for the last minute.
